job_purpose: Designing and developing software solutions for AGITO's automation solutions, supporting systems in the field, and contributing to the global expansion of automation technologies.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Build efficient and reusable applications and services for AGITO Automation solutions
Develop data analysis and reporting functionality
Design and develop tools and dashboards for Materials Handling and Warehousing systems
Develop innovative networking and communications solutions with a focus on cyber security, scalability, and performance
Work on IT Systems integration with mechatronic/robotic systems
Participate in code reviews and server setup
Commission, install, and connect developed systems at customer sites
Communicate software and AGITO's vision to internal teams and external customers
Provide software support and maintenance including after-hours support
required_qualifications: Tertiary Qualification in Computer Science, IT, Software Engineering, or related discipline
Minimum 2+ years' experience in Software Development
Solid programming skills in C#, .Net, Node.js, JAVA, JavaScript, HTML5, XML, JSON, SQL, NoSQL
Experience in Linux and Windows platforms
Ability to adapt to new programming frameworks and languages
Practical site experience with automation systems
company_details: AGITO is a multinational engineering company specializing in automation and technology solutions for logistics, distribution, production, and materials handling. The recent partnership with Hilton Food Group is driving global expansion and innovation in the automation sector.
